member.summary: This method use for compare two assembly versions
member.returns: Less than zero= The current Version object is a version before value., Zero= The current Version object is the same version as value.,Greater than zero=The current Version object is a version subsequent to value. OR value is null.

member.summary: This method is to change color of image

members.member:
Downloads image data from the specified URL using WebClient.
The URL of the image to download. A byte array containing the image data, or null if an error occurs. Shubham[skadam] GEOS2-8118 Due to protocol in service get error where images get from api in workbench 15 05 2025
